name: RXA_DUR_OUT
description: Clarity extract of the DUR OUT group.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: O_REAS_SERV_CODE_ID
columns.description: Code identifying the type of utilization conflict detected by the prescriber or the pharmacist or the reason for the pharmacist's professional service.

columns.name: O_REAS_SERV_CODE_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: O_PROF_SERV_CODE_ID
columns.description: The code that identifies the pharmacist intervention taken when a conflict code has been identified or service has been rendered.

columns.name: O_PROF_SERV_CODE_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: O_RES_SERV_CODE_ID
columns.description: Action taken by a pharmacist or prescriber in response to a conflict or as the result of a pharmacist's professional service.

columns.name: O_RES_SERV_CODE_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: O_DUR_LEVEL_EFF_ID
columns.description: Code indicating the level of effort as determined by the complexity of decision-making or resources utilized by a pharmacist to perform a professional service.

columns.name: O_DUR_LEVEL_EFF_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: O_DUR_COAGENT_Q_ID
columns.description: The code that qualifies the value in 'DUR Co-Agent ID' (476-H6).

columns.name: O_DUR_COAGENT_Q_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: O_DUR_COAGENT_ID
columns.description: Identifies the co-existing agent contributing to the DUR event (drug or disease conflicting with the prescribed drug or prompting pharmacist professional service).

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
